Articles.Content:
Hello guys, I am an indie developer and I'm new to this game and so far I'm LOVING IT! I do indie game reviews and make some of my own on the way (I use Unity3D to make games). So far I've landed on the infamous Mun.

Way better than my first landing.

Anyway, I'll be on these forums for a while now that I've found this game. Will make some gameplay videos later probably!

YouTube channel

http://www.youtube.com/user/IndieDev3D

Time to blast some socks off some kerbals!
Good job landing on the mun, it is a huge feat for any newcomer! I would love to play, even beta test some of your games, they look great sir!!!

It's always good to hear of new people finding out about the game.

Hello, and happy flying
Welcome to the forums! If you need help with anything, just ask. We'll be happy to help you.

Welcome to the forums!

As others have alluded to, if you need any help with any of the trickier parts of the game, there are lots of experienced players around who can answer any questions you might have, particularly in the How To section of the forums. There's also the Drawing Board (link in my sig), a collection of tutorials and other useful resources.

Happy landings!

Good job landing on the mun, it is a huge feat for any newcomer! I would love to play, even beta test some of your games, they look great sir!!!

Thanks! Oh and you can test some of my games! I announced one of them on my channel called "Zombie Game" alpha.

oooOOOooo IndieDev Rocket man.... Fantastic! You also work with 3D games? Planning any mods to KSP? I'd love to see your work; but you probably have your own projects to work on of course... but still most fantastic, CHEERS! Oh yes and welcome to the Program.

oooOOOooo IndieDev Rocket man.... Fantastic! You also work with 3D games? Planning any mods to KSP? I'd love to see your work; but you probably have your own projects to work on of course... but still most fantastic, CHEERS! Oh yes and welcome to the Program.

Thanks! If you want you can see the work I showed on my channel yesterday!

http://www.youtube.com/user/IndieDev3D

Oh and I just landed my first space-craft on Minmus!

Thanks for all the warm welcomes guys!
Nice job on the Mun landing!Just wait until you land on another planet,or dock in orbit.Now THAT'S a great achievement!

Nice job on the Mun landing!Just wait until you land on another planet,or dock in orbit.Now THAT'S a great achievement!

OK, gonna do it for my game play video! XD

[closed]

Edited July 4, 2021 by benjiful9000
Cleaning house

One question: Why does your lander have two command pods, when it looks like there's only room for one to go home? Seems like one of your poor kerbalnaughts is going to meet a sticky end there

Well it's designed to be a 1 man lander, and incase something happens (like the parachute ripping off on big re-entry speeds or you can't decelerate quickly enough with the big lander) to save the guy for rescue.

EDIT: I kinda left it there also incase some guy gets stranded and needs to go home (notice I have 3 parachutes, 2 for the lander pod and 1 for the escape pod).

[closed]

Edited July 4, 2021 by benjiful9000
Cleaning house

Oh that does actually make sense. I feel silly now.

It's no big deal.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Thank you, monkey, thing... LoL

Welcome to the community IndieDev3D

Cool landings, well done! Something to try as well is landing next to another lander, it's a useful ability if you want to make a Mun or Minmus base and quite the challenge too

Welcome to the community IndieDev3D

Cool landings, well done! Something to try as well is landing next to another lander, it's a useful ability if you want to make a Mun or Minmus base and quite the challenge too

OK, thanks! I sure will! Oh and I made a cool jet-pack, thingy. XD

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/32079-First-ever-Kerbal-Jet-pack!
